name: Churros
description:
You're trying to visit the Christmas market but you are hounded by fans! Give them churros and chips to get rid of them!

The result of my very first participation in a game jam. I decided to go as a solo dev and I severely underestimated how much work goes into a game and how many aspects you need to keep an eye on.

It's a janky mess of a game with a simple concept: Keep moving, collect churros and chips to keep the fans away. if it gets too hectic, use Space to push them away.
